r.s: Validation class for the Republic of India
r.d: Contains locale validation for Indian: * Permanent Account Number (PAN and TAN) * State and Union Territory codes * Telephone Numbers * Postal (Zip) Codes * Vehicle License Plate Numbers
r.n: QA release Bug #12043 Ran phpcs on IN.php: found 45 errors and 13 warnings Bug #12044 attempt to install package fails Bug #12066 no test present for region method
